title: Amazon BSR Best Sellers Rank Explained Amazon Merch BSR Chrome Extension History Chart
channel: Print on Demand With Ryan A Raymond
description:
Does the amazon best sellers rank seem confusing to you?
If you want help understanding how to use the best sellers rank to understand the demand for products on amazon you need to take the time to understand the different categories on amazon! 

the Amazon BSR is a very simple algorithm that describes the sales velocity of a product on amazon. 

Each category has a different best sellers rank system and you can see this listed directly on each page. 

If you want help seeing the best sellers rank there are many bsr chrome extensions available on the chrome store that provide different levels of detail. 

But my favorite tool to use for amazon merch bsr research is the merchlytics chrome extension by merch informer. 

You get it included in your subscription when you subscribe to merch informer. 
BTW you can get 20% off with this merch informer discount code RYAN 
and you can sign up for merch informer using my affiliate link below!
http://www.ryanaraymond.com/INFORMER
